column5: Can anyone provide any recent reports from Gold Arrow Camp in Perrault Falls?

Can't help with a recent report since we were there over Memorial Day. We hit the post-spawn lull this year so finding 'eyes was work. The latest fish photos on the GA Facebook page were posted just a week ago today (1st bear pics went up this morning.) Recent reports from Cedar, Perrault, and Wasbaskang would lead me to think the fishing's been pretty good on the GA lakes.Hope your question means you have a trip planned yet this year!!
